bind.name: gotoAndStop!
bind.value: _isEmptySlot ? ('empty_slot_' + _formationType) : isInBattle ? ('player_in_battle_' + _formationType + postfix) : _isWardog && isReady ? ('player_ready_' + _formationType + '_merc') : _isWardog && !isReady ? ('player_not_ready_' + _formationType + '_merc') : isCommander && isReady ? ('commander_' + _formationType + postfix) : isCommander && !isReady ? ('commander_not_ready_' +_formationType + postfix) : !isCommander && isReady ? ('player_ready_' + _formationType + postfix) : !isCommander && !isReady ? ('player_not_ready_' + _formationType + postfix) : 'empty_slot_division'

bind.name: watch
bind.value: 'loyaltyPointsProgressBarTooltip'; loyaltyPointsToday < loyaltyPointsArray[0] ? loyaltyPointsToday / loyaltyPointsArray[_index] * 100 : (loyaltyPointsToday - loyaltyPointsArray[_index - 1]) / (loyaltyPointsArray[_index] - loyaltyPointsArray[_index - 1]) * 100

bind.name: watch
bind.value: 'loyaltyParams'; [ { title: 'IDS_LOYALTY_RESTRICTION_1', value: endDayLoyalty }, { title: 'IDS_LOYALTY_RESTRICTION_2', value: staySideLoyalty }]

bind.name: watch
bind.value: 'progressValue'; (isFull == true) ? 10: (isEmpty == true) ? 0: (commonActiveIndex > 0) ? (commonPointsToday - commonPointsArray[commonActiveIndex - 1]) / (commonPointsArray[commonActiveIndex] - commonPointsArray[commonActiveIndex - 1]) : commonPointsToday / commonPointsArray[commonActiveIndex]
